title: Spiced vegetable curry
description: This is a mild and creamy curry recipe suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Or if you’re a meat eater wanting to try out some delicious vegetarian meals for a change then this one is perfect.
ingredients: 1 large sweet potato, cut into chunks
1/2 small cauliflower (about 375g), broken into small florets

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and sauté the onion and garlic for 5-6 minutes, until softened. Stir in the curry paste and fry for 2 minutes.

method.Step 2: Add the coconut milk, stock, beans, potato, corn and cauliflower. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 10 minutes, until the vegetables are just tender.

method.Step 3: Season to taste, then stir in the ground almonds and lentils. Simmer for a few minutes more until warmed through. Serve with plain boiled rice.
